greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle: T(n,k) gives the number of ways to 2-color k edges of the n-cube up to rotation and reflection, with 0 <= k <= A001787(n).
comment: Conjecture: All rows are unimodal (increasing, then decreasing).
A333333 is analogous with the restriction that the colorings must be connected.
link: Mathematics Stack Exchange, Number of 2-colorings of edges of the n-dimensional cube?.
results.author: _Peter Kagey_, Mar 20 2020
